sentences.en: A diversified gameplay: Acrobatic & free - running a chaotic manhunt on horseback.
sentences.cn: 多元化的游戏: 杂技 及 自由运行的混沌搜捕在马背上.

sentences.en: Acrobatic Dashijie a construction project in April 28,1992 laid the foundation stone.
sentences.cn: 杂技大世界一期建设工程于1992年4月28日奠基.

sentences.en: As an adolescent , Isolder honed his physical skills and acrobatic abilities.
sentences.cn: 他的生活充满机遇,因此他从不嫉妒哥哥.

sentences.en: Dancing on a rope is an acrobatic feat.
sentences.cn: 在纲丝绳上跳舞是一种特技

sentences.en: He performed a sensational acrobatic feat.
sentences.cn: 他表演了一套惊人的杂技功夫。

sentences.en: I heard that the acrobatic show this evening is very good.
sentences.cn: 我听说今晚的杂技表演很不错.

sentences.en: Inverted flight is an acrobatic manoeuvre of the plane.
sentences.cn: 倒飞是飞机的一种特技动作.

sentences.en: My sister was a famous opera acrobatic - fighting actress when she was young.
sentences.cn: 姐姐年轻的时候是京剧团的著名武旦.

sentences.en: The acrobatic tricks absorbed the children.
sentences.cn: 杂技表演使孩子们神往.

sentences.en: The acrobatic troupe livened the garden party up immensely.
sentences.cn: 杂技团的表演使游园会大为活跃.

sentences.en: The entertainment consisted of comic songs, dances and acrobatic performance, and wound up with a screamingly funny farce.
sentences.cn: 娱乐的节目包括滑稽歌曲 、 舞蹈和杂技, 最后是一场令人捧腹大笑的滑稽闹剧.

sentences.en: The excellent acrobatic performance brought down the house.
sentences.cn: 精采的杂技表演博得全场喝采.

sentences.en: They laid on an acrobatic performance for the children.
sentences.cn: 他们为孩子们安排了一场杂技表演.

sentences.en: They performed some amazing acrobatic feats.
sentences.cn: 他们表演了一些令人惊叹的杂技动作。

sentences.en: Tom: Is Chinese acrobatic performance very dull and boring?
sentences.cn: 汤姆: 中国的杂技表演枯燥无味 吗 ?

sentences.en: Tonight enjoy a Beijing Roast Duck dinner and an Acrobatic show.
sentences.cn: 晚上欣赏杂技表演及品尝北京烤鸭宴.

words.tran_cn: 杂技演员，特技演员；随机应变者；翻云覆雨者，善变者

trans.tran_cn: 杂技的，杂技般的，杂技演员的
trans.tran_en: acrobatic movements involve moving your body in a very skilful way, for example by jumping through the air or balancing on a rope
